hints.content:
We start at $8{:}15$ when Maxime leaves for school.

[[☃ image 1]]

options.alt: A number line labeled 8:15 to 9:00 with tick marks every 1 unit. A point appears at 8:15. !

hints.content: Each tick mark on the number line represents $1$ minute.

So, we need to move **right** on the number line $27$ minutes.

[[☃ image 1]]

$\begin{align}
{8{:}15} +{} &\greenD{20}\text{ minutes} = 8{:}35\\\\
8{:}35 +{} & \purpleD{5}\text{ minutes} = 8{:}40 \\\\
8{:}40 +{}&\goldE{2}\text{ minutes} = \goldE{8{:}42}\\\\
\end{align}$

options.alt: A number line labeled 8:15 to 9:00 with tick marks every 1 unit. A series of three arrows are shown moving left to right from the 8:15 tick mark to the 8:42 tick mark. The first arrow starts at the 8:15 tick mark and ends at the 8:35 tick mark and is labeled plus 20. The second arrow starts at the 8:35 tick mark and ends at the 8:40 tick mark and is labeled plus 5. The third arrow starts at the 8:40 tick mark and ends at the 8:42 tick mark and is labeled plus 2. !

hints.content:
Maxime arrives at school at $8{:}42\text{ a.m.}$

[[☃ image 1]]

options.alt: A number line labeled 8:15 to 9:00 with tick marks every 1 unit. A point appears at the 8:42 tick mark. !

question.content:
It takes Maxime $27$ minutes to walk to school. She starts walking to school at $8{:}15\text{ a.m.}$

**Which number line below graphs when Maxime arrives at school?**

[[☃ radio 1]]

choices.content: ![A number line labeled 8:15 to 9:00 with tick marks every 1 unit. A point appears at the 8:42 tick mark.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/39b8c1d65d77b3a2d661e68ed1abda261ff0909c)
![A number line labeled 8:15 to 9:00 with tick marks every 1 unit. A point appears at the 8:37 tick mark.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/dcb48c5af192f24e2b2dc9c7c9c5dfd3ccdacf8f)
![A number line labeled 8:15 to 9:00 with tick marks every 1 unit. A point appears at the 8:47 tick mark.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/3f2fbbf971263a38d595c5d6bf2ac6e044823510)
